g.text: extracts household_id from Administrator User object (sender of invitation)
calls Mail service to send Email
send invitation link to new User
query invitation by email, is_used=false, created_after expiration time period before current time
HTTP Response: Registration data (email, household_id, role_id) / Error
Registration form (username, password) (prefilled and immutable: email, household_id and role_id)
HTTP Request: POST /users {username, password, email, household_id, role_id, token}
verify_invitation(plain_token, email) check if token is still valid
query invitation by email, is_used=false, created_after expiration time period before current time
HTTP Response: Success/Redirection to login / Error
